description:
Archinstall 3.0.3 Arch Linux menu-based installer is now available with improved support for the Limine bootloader, new options, and more. Here's what's new!

The post Arch Linux Installer Archinstall 3.0.3 Improves Limine Bootloader Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Arch Linux Installer Archinstall 3.0.3 Improves Limine Bootloader Support

description:
The CachyOS ISO snapshot for March 2025 is now available for download with a new bootloader, Linux kernel 6.14, GNOME 48, and other changes. Here's what's new!

The post CachyOS ISO Snapshot for March 2025 Brings New Bootloader, Linux Kernel 6.14 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: CachyOS ISO Snapshot for March 2025 Brings New Bootloader, Linux Kernel 6.14

description:
Shotcut 25.03 open-source video editor is now available for download with new features, various improvements, and many bug fixes. Here's what's new!

The post Shotcut 25.03 Open-Source Video Editor Released with Various New Features appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Shotcut 25.03 Open-Source Video Editor Released with Various New Features
